storyInfo: Day after day guarding the village gradually wears on Lava, Mr.Nothing, and Kroos. But Dawn reveals some useful information: the Ink Spirits also fear firecrackers.

attributes.content: Guh...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Ink Spirits. Ink... Spirit. What a beautiful name.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Saga is such an bright girl.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Again and again, she protects the things she knows can't be damaged. I wonder if that means they will grow sick of this pointless exercise and give up on that righteousness one of these days?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I suppose she will. After all, if you can restore broken porcelain, then it's not going to be much of a heartbreak at all to see it shatter into pieces.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: You might even come to enjoy the feeling of breaking it.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: ...Gaa?
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: But do we have to go that far...? Human nature is no match for these trials and tribulations.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Are you watching, Dusk?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: You are such a meanie... I only hope don't mind what I have planned.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: —Hff!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: My benefactors, we've done it at last!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Forgive me for throwing cold water, but with no end in sight to our daily scuffles with the monsters, surely you agree with me our search for the way out is making hardly any progress?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Saga said she'd come up with something.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: And so we will take on the Ink Spirits here day after day? This hardly feels like the best use of our time...
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: It's no big deal to me.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Just think of it as a way to hone our techniques.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: —Lava, mate.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hmm? What's up?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Go on?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: The Arts you used back there looked just a little bit dangerous.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: See? You burned down quite a few stores.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: And you, Nothing, mate.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You pretended you didn't see that small Ink Spirit rush toward town, did you?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I thought you would have no trouble taking care of it.
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: No, you thought, 'If something goes wrong, everything will just go back to the way it was tomorrow.'
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I... I can't deny I did... I know what you mean, but...
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Today's the seventh day.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I'm not trying to give you a hard time. When you pointlessly protect the same objectives day after day, you're bound to feel that way sooner or later.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Remember Rim Billiton, though... Don't ever forget what that bloody month taught us.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: War can wear you down mentally, so we need to be alert.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Kroos...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Sorry... Mate, you know that I've always...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It's okay. I understand.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: We'll be fine. We'll get out of here and make it back to Rhodes Island in one piece.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Alright~ Be sure to treat me to some Columbian coffee once we're back.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Is Saga still in the room?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I stole a glance before leaving this morning. It has been seven days since she started meditating... My benefactor, if we die of starvation or thirst in this painting, do you suppose that... we might truly die?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: No idea. All Saga said before she shut herself in was something like, 'Leave it to me...'
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: She's the one who understands most what's going on in the painting. We don't have any other choice, or are you volunteering to take a stroll inside the other scrolls, just like what she's doing?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: No, no, no. I'm hardly as determined as the master. I'm afraid I would find myself distracted and never able to return.
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: There just isn't much we can do for her until something happens on her end.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: So this is where you've been.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Dawn? What's the matter?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I wanted to remind you to never stray from your true conscience.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I once told Saga, 'When deceit is taken for truth, the truth is yet unreal. When naught is taken for aught, there is yet but nil.'
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Right, where is she?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: She's been meditating in the room for days.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I see. She wants to wake up.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: There have been very few people who managed to wake up from the scroll on their own volition. Actually, I should say there has never been anyone who has managed to do it.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: But... maybe.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Ms. Lava, have you heard of 'firecrackers?'
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: It's a time-honored tradition in Yen. As you can imagine, it was at first—
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: —For warding off ancient monsters?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh... I thought you were born outside of Yen? You know your Yen traditions well.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Well, let's just say I've got a friend...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Right, now I remember...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Please don't remember.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: This is straight out of 'Ancient Forge,' isn't it? I remember something about Nian being scared of firecrackers. The Dark Devastator in the end used cannons as well—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: —Aahhhh, I can't hear you!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Dawn! What do firecrackers have to do with this situation?!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hm? Oh... I was going to say the Ink Spirits are actually scared of firecrackers.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: If we hang some firecrackers up at the village's entrance, they will naturally stay away.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Really?!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Wow, what a lifesaver! My back has been hurting me the past day and a half! At last, I can take the day off from looking for monsters!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Now, without further ado, let us take to the market—
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: You won't find them in the market.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: —Quite right. How do we procure some, then?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Well, there is a way...
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Do you know why firecrackers are called as such?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Because the earliest Yen people thought to commemorate their fallen liege's exploits by setting bamboo on fire, and memorialize the great war with its crackling sounds.
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: You know your stuff.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Haha, I'm merely well-read on the subject.
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: There you have it.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Let's give them a surprise unlike any other.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: This one will do?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: What a fine bamboo tree. Would be a waste to cut it down!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: It will grow anew tomorrow.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Showing no mercy to the flora, are we...?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: I'm back! Is this enough?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: The more the better.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: The Umbrella-Boiler is such a nice guy. He gave us all this bamboo for nothing.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: If you're worried about taking the bamboo, I'll pay the storyteller a visit and give him our thanks. No one ever comes back to my pawn shop for their items. I could just give him everything as a sign of our gratitude.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Are you sure about that?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: It will all be mine again tomorrow.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Hm, I've seen firewood burn and crackle up pretty good, but does bamboo do that too?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Supposedly, wet bamboo after the rain gives the most thunderous pops. The only problem is it never rains here.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Right, just like this... Make a kind of stove with the mud...
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Now, as for the fire—
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: —Let me try.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Be careful with the heat. It's a bit more finicky than it seems.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I-I'll try my best...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: My benefactor! They are here!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Now!
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Mph—
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Gkh... gkhaa—?!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: We did it! They're dazed!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Gkhaa—!!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: They ran? Are they truly afraid of it?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Did it really work...? Why is that...?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We'll have to ask Nian—
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...Nian?
attributes.name: Storyteller
